mapper.select: /* QueryID : kr.co.bestiansoft.ebillservicekg.bill.billApply.agree.repository.AgreeMapper.selectAgreeDetail */ select AA.bill_id , AA.bill_no , kgst.fngetlangnm(AA.bill_name_kg,AA.bill_name_ru,AA.bill_name_kg,#{lang}) as bill_name -- 안건 이름 , kgst.fngetlangnm(vum.member_nm_kg,vum.member_nm_ru,vum.member_nm_kg,#{lang}) as ppsr_nm -- 제안자 이름 , AA.scl_dsc_rcp_nmb , AA.ppsl_dt , AA.reg_dt , AA.stat_nm , AA.stat_cd , AA.na_term_cd , kgst.fngetlangnm(AA.etc_kg,AA.etc_ru,AA.etc_kg,#{lang}) as etc -- 안건 이름 , ep.sign_dt , ep.sign_cnc_dt , ep.wt_dt , ep.wt_cnc_dt , case when ep.sign_dt is null then 'N' else 'Y' end as agree_yn , case when ep.wt_dt is null then 'N' else 'Y' end as wt_yn , COALESCE(kgst.fngetlangnm(AA.etc_kg,AA.etc_ru,AA.etc_kg,#{lang}),'') as etc -- 안건 이름 from ( select pl.bill_id , max(pl.bill_no) as bill_no , max(pl.bill_name_kg) as bill_name_kg , max(pl.bill_name_ru) as bill_name_ru , max(pl.current_step_id) as current_step_id , max(pl.ppsr_id) as ppsr_id , max(pl.ppsl_dt) as ppsl_dt , max(pl.scl_dsc_rcp_nmb) as scl_dsc_rcp_nmb , max(pl.reg_dt) as reg_dt , max(pl.na_term_cd) as na_term_cd , max(pl.etc_kg) as etc_kg , max(pl.etc_ru) as etc_ru , max(ebs.stat_cd) as stat_cd , kgst.fngetcodenm('1010',max(ebs.stat_cd),#{lang}) as stat_nm from kgst.view_bill_process_list pl join kgst.ebs_bp_step ebs on (pl.bp_df_id = ebs.bp_df_id and pl.current_step_id = ebs.step_id) group by bill_id ) AA join kgst.view_user_member vum on (AA.ppsr_id = vum.user_id) join kgst.ebs_proposer ep on (AA.bill_id = ep.bill_id and ep.proposer_id = #{userId}) where AA.bill_id = #{billId}

/* QueryID : kr.co.bestiansoft.ebillservicekg.bill.billApply.agree.repository.AgreeMapper.selectAgreeProposerList */ select ep.proposer_id -- 제안자 대상 , case when ep.sign_dt is null then 'N' else 'Y' end as agree_yn -- 동의여부 , case when ep.wt_dt is null then 'N' else 'Y' end as wt_yn -- 철회동의여부 , kgst.fngetlangnm(vum.member_nm_kg,vum.member_nm_ru,vum.member_nm_kg,#{lang}) as member_nm -- 의원이름 , vum.member_nm_kg -- 의원이름kg , vum.member_nm_ru -- 의원이름ru , vum.poly_nm -- 정당이름 , vum.poly_cd -- 정당코드 from ebs_proposer ep left join kgst.view_user_member vum on (vum.member_id = ep.proposer_id) where ep.bill_id = #{billId}
